titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the retail tax on heavy trucks and trailers to exclude tractors suitable for use with vehicles weighing 33,000 pounds or less.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/5/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to modify the retail tax on heavy trucks and trailers to exclude tractors suitable for use with vehicles weighing 33,000 pounds or less and which are not in a trade or business.
